suncertify.commons
Class LoggingObject

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.commons.LoggingObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseLockManagerImpl, Business, Command, Data, DefaultFinderImp, HotelRoom, Mediator, PropertiesManager, RemoteData, RemoteDataAdapter, RemoteDBAccessFactoryImpl, Server, URLyBirdFile_1_2_1
public class LoggingObject
extends Object

Adds logging capabilities to extending classes.
Extending classes inherit a protected logger ready to use.

Version:
1.0 27/09/2010
Author:
Ignacio del Valle Alles

Field Detail

loggingFolder

public static File loggingFolder
Path of the logging files.

Method Detail

configureLogging

public static void configureLogging(String relativeFolderPath,
                                    String filePrefix)
                             throws IOException
Configures the logging for namespace "suncertify". If called twice per application, an IllegalStateException is thrown.

Parameters:
relativeFolderPath - folder path relative to user.home where the logging files will be located.
filePrefix - prefix of logging files.
Throws:
IOException - if an IO error occurs.
IllegalStateException, - if the method is called twice per application.
